word_mean: 庆大霉素：一种抗生素复合物，从放线菌紫单孢丝菌(Micromonospora purpurea)和棘孢单孢丝菌(M. echinospora)分离而得，由A，B，C等成分组成。医用是C成分的三个组分(C1，C1a，C2)的混合物。本品为广谱杀菌药，对许多革兰氏阴性菌皆有良效，尤其是假单胞菌属(Pseudomonas)诸种，以及一些革兰氏阳性菌种，尤其是金黄色葡萄球菌(Staphylococcus aureus)

sentence.Network_en: Objective To investigate the ototoxicity of a new chemical preparation salicylate gentamicin.
sentence.Network_cn: 目的探讨庆大霉素新剂型-水杨酸庆大霉素的耳毒性.

sentence.Network_en: He received gentamicin and salicylate showed minor hearing impairment.
sentence.Network_cn: 他接受庆大霉素和水杨酸盐治疗,发生轻度听力损害.

sentence.Network_en: In the present study, gradients of gentamicin along the cochlea were measured.
sentence.Network_cn: 在目前的研究之中, 可以测量庆大霉素沿着耳蜗的浓度梯度分布.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 庆大霉素(gentamicin)口服吸收很少，肌内注射吸收迅速而完全。在肾皮质中积聚的药物可比血浆浓度高出数倍，停药20d后仍能在尿 …
镰孢菌酸 fusarinic acid艮他霉素 gentamicin胶霉毒素 gliotoxin

list.abs: 化工英语翻译常用专业词汇 - 豆丁网 ... 氨己烯酸 Vigabatrin 硫酸庆大霉素 GENTAMICIN SULPHATE 整理编辑苯芴醇 LUMEFANTRI…

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 20th cent.: from genta- (of unknown origin) + -micin (alteration of -mycin)

means.word_mean: 1. an antibiotic (trade name Garamycin) that is derived from an actinomycete; used in treating infections of the urinary tract
